data.title: Capitol Studios

data.text:
For nearly 70 years, the legendary Capitol Studios has been home to many of the world’s top artists, producers, and creators. Located on the first floor of the historic Capitol Tower in Hollywood, Studio A and Studio B have hosted legends ranging from Frank Sinatra, Nat King Cole, Ella Fitzgerald, and The Beach Boys, through to contemporary greats such as John Mayer, Green Day, Billie Eilish, and Daft Punk.

Capitol Studios specializes in live recording sessions, orchestra tracking, mixing for music and film, photo and film shoots, and live streamed events. While fostering an environment of creativity and energy, Capitol Studios and its staff have maintained a reputation for innovation in recording and mixing techniques, and most recently collaborating with Dolby to push forward high standards in Atmos music.
